about_the_game:
Featuring legendary guest composer Akira Yamaoka (Silent Hill) and veteran indie composer Pete Wicher. Haunting and ethereal at times. Hellacious and unnerving at others. Get lost in the captivating original score on your journey across Aspen Falls, containing a total of 60 tracks and over 3 hours of music! Includes a treasure trove of exclusive bonus tracks not featured in the game.

OST Track List:

Disc 1 - Welcome to Aspen Falls: The Music of Stray Souls

1. "Stray Souls" - Pete Wicher
2. "Melancholia" - Pete Wicher
3. "Daniel's Theme" - Pete Wicher
4. "Don't Trust a Stranger" - Pete Wicher
5. "Lovely Day for a Hike" - Pete Wicher
6. "Unhappy Campers" - Pete Wicher
7. "Somebody's Birthday" - Pete Wicher
8. "Eye of the Storm" - Pete Wicher
9. "The Glutton" - Pete Wicher
10. "Hail to the Chief" - Pete Wicher
11. "Slow Dive" - Akira Yamaoka
12. "Welcome to Aspen Falls" - Akira Yamaoka
13. "Time for a Tune Up" - Akira Yamaoka
14. "Kill Them All" - Akira Yamaoka
15. "Light on the Horizon" - Akira Yamaoka
16. "Blood and Oil" - Akira Yamaoka
17. "Ugly Weather" - Akira Yamaoka
18. "When Darkness Comes" - Akira Yamaoka
19. "That's Not Grandma Anymore" - Pete Wicher
20. "Interlude" - Akira Yamaoka
21. "Splintered Mind" - Akira Yamaoka
22. "The Flood" - Twelve Days in June
23. "Red" - Pete Wicher

Disc 2 - The Road to Nowhere: The Expanded Music of Stray Souls

1. "Norman's Theme" - Pete Wicher
2. "Blood on the Keys" - Pete Wicher
3. "Last House on Earth" - Akira Yamaoka
4. "Carcass of a Failed Empire" - Pete Wicher
5. "Gas Guzzler" - Pete Wicher
6. "Truth is a Lie" - Akira Yamaoka
7. "Hollow Grave" - Akira Yamaoka
8. "Headstone" - Pete Wicher
9. "Deadly Detour" - Akira Yamaoka
10. "Suburbia" - Pete Wicher
11. "Undead Communication" - Pete Wicher
12. "All the Way Home" - Akira Yamaoka
13. "Old Hag" - Pete Wicher
14. "Granny Needs to Chill" - Pete Wicher
15. "Never Leave Home" - Akira Yamaoka
16. "Something is Up in the Attic" - Pete Wicher
17. "Toy Blocks" - Pete Wicher
18. "Time for a Drink" - Akira Yamaoka
19. "Empty Vessel" - Pete Wicher
20. "Black Hole Mind" - Pete Wicher
21. "Familiar Secrets" - Akira Yamaoka
22. "Arrival" - Pete Wicher
23. "Lonely Town" - Pete Wicher
24. "Unconscious" - Akira Yamaoka
25. "The Storm" - Pete Wicher
26. "They're Everywhere" - Pete Wicher
27. "The Devil is Bowling" - Akira Yamaoka
28. "The Wendigo (Phase 1)" - Pete Wicher
29. "The Wendigo (Phase 2)" - Pete Wicher
30. "Some Ghosts are People" - Akira Yamaoka
31. "Halls of Justice" - Pete Wicher
32. "I Fought the Law" - Pete Wicher
33. "Revelations" - Pete Wicher
34. "Pitch Black" - Pete Wicher
35. "The Worm" - Pete Wicher
36. "Blessed" - Pete Wicher
37. "Broken Road" - Pete Wicher

ARTIST: Pete Wicher, Akira Yamaoka

OTHER CREDITS: Drums on "Red" by: Adam Soucy
Additional production on "Red" by: Jim Simmons
Additional production on ""The Flood"" by: Jim Simmons & Tim Boyce
"The Flood" written by: Dave Hulegaard

name: Stray Souls Soundtrack
short_description: Featuring legendary guest composer Akira Yamaoka (Silent Hill) and veteran indie composer Pete Wicher. The Stray Souls OST contains a total of 60 tracks and over 3 hours of music, including exclusive bonus tracks not featured in the game!
